title: mAlirum shOlai
sahitya:
mAlirum shOlai ninra azhagA ninpAl maiyal  koNDE vandEn aruL tA tiru


anupallavi

  Aliaiyil tUyinrAi 9anru) enrum anbarkkaruLa aruL vaDivAi inru


caraNam    kamalap-padam kaNDAl kali tIrum unran kara kamalam pavappiNi tIrkkum shenkamala nayanam aruL 
shErkkum enru kali koNDun pugazh pADi kAlamellAm aruL nADi gati tEDi uLam vADi kalandunnODuravADa
